incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our cooling infrastructure. Start time : 05/05/2025 08:00 UTC End time : 08/05/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing a preventive cooling maintenance in LIM1. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our backbone infrastructure. Start time : 05/05/2025 08:30 UTC End time : 05/05/2025 10:30 UTC Service impact : During the maintenance, there may be some configuration delays within the OneNetwork scope for approximately 20 minutes. However, there will be no impact on network traffic. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment to improve general performance. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Backbone offer. This may temporarily affect Latency. Start time : 05/05/2025 13:00 UTC End time : 05/05/2025 14:00 UTC Service impact : Latency is expected for OneAPI tasks during the change Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure. Start time : 05/05/2025 22:00 UTC End time : 06/05/2025 00:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out maintenance on our cooling infrastructure in the room E101E/F. Start time : 07/05/2025 09:00 UTC End time : 07/05/2025 12:00 UTC Service impact : The cooling system's efficiency could be temporarily impacted for some servers, which could cause a decreased performance during this maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our infrastructure. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure. Start time : 12/05/2025 06:00 UTC End time : 12/05/2025 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some preventive electrical background work. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of the continuous improvement of our services, we have planned an evolution of the network infrastructure on the Roubaix site on May 12, 2025. Start time : 12/05/2025 20:00 UTC End time : 13/05/2025 05:00 UTC Service impact : Some network perturbation can be observe during the 3rd step for a duration of 5 to 10 min. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network core infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on multiple network equipment. This maintenance will be structured around three phases, described in detail below : Step 1 : Preparation of the maintenance operation (about 2 hours) Step 2 : Deployment of the new infrastructure (about 3 hours) Step 3 : Testing and activation of the new infrastructure (about3 hours) We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding as we work to improve our services. Thank you for your understanding.

Start time : 14/05/2025 20:00 UTC End time : 15/05/2025 05:00 UTC Service impact : Some network perturbation can be observe during the 3rd step for a duration of 5 to 10 min. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network core infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on multiple network equipment. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Start time : 17/05/2025 04:00 UTC End time : 17/05/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : Some servers in this rack will be unavailable for a maximum of 12 hours. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some cooling system replacement and upgrade. The maintenance may be completed in less time than expected, and we are committed to minimizing the outage duration. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure. Start time : 29/05/2025 11:00 UTC End time : 29/05/2025 20:00 UTC Service impact : Some servers might be temporarily unavailable during 20 minutes. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing an electrical maintenance. The operation is carried out in several steps: Step 1 : From 11:00 UTC to 11:30 UTC, this step may temporarily affect Availability of servers Step 2 : From 11:30 UTC to 19:30 UTC Step 3 : From 19:30 UTC to 20:00 UTC, this step may temporarily affect Availability of servers Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS4 are T04A, T04B and T04C Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS6 are T06B, T06C, T06D, T06E, T06F and T06G Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS7 are B702, B703, B707 and B709 Our technical teams will be mobilized throughout the maintenance to resolve any impact on your services. We apologize in advance for any inconvenience caused.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
